Before we begin working with financial calculators, you should familiarize yourself with
your TI by locating the TVM keys noted below. These are the only keys you need to
know to work virtually all TVM problems.
N = Number of compounding periods.
• I/Y = Interest rate per compounding period.
PV =
Present value.
FV = Future value.
PMT.
Annuity payments, or constant periodic cash flow.
CPT = Compute.
